scripts.prepush:ci: npm run prettier:check && npm run lint && npm run test:vr && npm run test:ci
scripts.test:vr: docker run --rm --entrypoint "" -v $(pwd):/app -w /app -e RUN_VR=true cypress-vr-tests npm run build && npm run test:cypress:run
scripts.test:vr:specific: docker run --rm --entrypoint ""  -v $(pwd):/app -w /app -e RUN_VR=true cypress-vr-tests npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test:vr:update: docker run --rm --entrypoint ""  -v $(pwd):/app -w /app -e RUN_VR=true cypress-vr-tests npm run build && npm run test:cypress:vr-update
